  • Method Details

    • createCookie

      public static jakarta.servlet.http.Cookie createCookie(Cookies.CookieKey cookieKey, String cookieValue, int maxAgeSeconds, EnumSet<Cookies.Option> options)
      Creates a cookie.
      Parameters:
      cookieKey - The key.
      cookieValue - The value.
      maxAgeSeconds - The maximum age in seconds. If < 0, cookie is temporary. If 0, cookie is deleted, if it exists.
      options - The cookie options.
      Returns:
      The cookie.

    • createCookie

      public static jakarta.servlet.http.Cookie createCookie(Cookies.CookieKey cookieKey, String cookieValue, int maxAgeSeconds, EnumSet<Cookies.Option> options, Cookies.SameSiteOption sameSiteOption)
      Creates a cookie.
      Parameters:
      cookieKey - The key.
      cookieValue - The value.
      maxAgeSeconds - The maximum age in seconds. If < 0, cookie is temporary. If 0, cookie is deleted, if it exists.
      options - The cookie options.
      sameSiteOption - The cooke same-site option.
      Returns:
      The cookie.

    • setCookie

      public static void setCookie(Cookies.CookieKey cookieKey, String cookieValue, int maxAgeSeconds, EnumSet<Cookies.Option> options, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
      Sets a cookie.
      Parameters:
      cookieKey - The key.
      cookieValue - The value.
      maxAgeSeconds - The maximum age in seconds. If < 0, cookie is temporary. If 0, cookie is deleted, if it exists.
      options - The cookie options.
      resp - The response.

    • setCookie

      public static void setCookie(Cookies.CookieKey cookieKey, String cookieValue, int maxAgeSeconds, EnumSet<Cookies.Option> options, Cookies.SameSiteOption sameSiteOption, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
      Sets a cookie with a same-site option.
      Parameters:
      cookieKey - The key.
      cookieValue - The value.
      maxAgeSeconds - The maximum age in seconds. If < 0, cookie is temporary. If 0, cookie is deleted, if it exists.
      options - The cookie options.
      sameSiteOption - The same-site option.
      resp - The response.

    • setCookie

      public static void setCookie(String cookieName, String cookieValue, int maxAgeSeconds, EnumSet<Cookies.Option> options, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
      Sets a cookie that applies to the current domain and any path.
      Parameters:
      cookieName - The name.
      cookieValue - The value.
      maxAgeSeconds - The maximum age in seconds. If < 0, cookie is temporary. If 0, cookie is deleted, if it exists.
      options - The cookie options.
      resp - The response.

    • setCookie

      public static void setCookie(String cookieName, String cookieValue, int maxAgeSeconds, EnumSet<Cookies.Option> options, Cookies.SameSiteOption sameSiteOption, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
      Sets a cookie that applies to the current domain and any path with a same-site option.
      Parameters:
      cookieName - The name.
      cookieValue - The value.
      maxAgeSeconds - The maximum age in seconds. If < 0, cookie is temporary. If 0, cookie is deleted, if it exists.
      options - The cookie options.
      sameSiteOption - The same-site option.
      resp - The response.

    • cookie

      public static final jakarta.servlet.http.Cookie cookie(String cookieName, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
      Gets the first named cookie.
      Parameters:
      cookieName - The name.
      req - The HTTP request.
      Returns:
      The cookie, or null if not found.
